context_menu_activate.message: Activate the mobile view on this page

extDescription.message: Smartphone and tablet simulator on computer with several models to test mobile responsive websites.

menu_add_window.message: Add a device in a new window

menu_faq_ignonito_mode.message: How to activate the simulator in incognito mode?

menu_faq_media_queries.message: My media queries are not working

menu_faq_scroll.message: Unable to scroll in the simulator

menu_info_device.message: Features & mockup of this phone (viewport resolution, etc.)

menu_share.message: Share with a colleague, a friend,...

menu_vote_feature.message: Vote for the features you want

new_iphone_15_h1.message: Be the first one to (virtually) use the iPhone 15 PRO

notification_update_title_v100_100_100.message:
InformationTouch scroll is not available in this simulator, but you can display the scrollbar if you don't have mousewheel or trackpad to scroll.

It is an option in the settings on the bottom right 

notification_update_title_v4_0_0.message: Update v4.0Important update regarding video capture. New video formats and unlimited recording time! 

notification_update_title_v4_0_1.message: Update v4.0Fixes regarding display issues in the simulator.

notification_update_title_v4_1_0.message: Update v4.13 new recent devices (in the PRO version). Google Pixel 8, Samsung Galaxy S24 and ULTRA 

notification_update_title_v4_1_2.message: Update v4.1.2Several bug fixes regarding the conversion of video captures

notification_update_title_v4_2_0.message: Update v4.2You can now test your websites with the latest iPhone 16. 

notification_update_title_v4_2_2.message: Update v4.2.2Fixes regarding the generation of video captures, as well as full page screenshots

popup_activate_local_files_info.message: This simulator can't be activated by default on local files (file:///) but you can manually activate the option in the Chrome settings page.

popup_message.message: Change device and find all the options by using the menu on the right of the simulator

popup_site_incompatible.message: This simulator can't be activated on this native Chrome page. Try on another tab. Or browser a website and relaunch.

pro_modale_h1_all_formats.message: Convert your video captures to GIF and MP4 formats

pro_modale_h1_limit.message: You have reached the limit of 5 tab records per day

pro_modale_h2.message: Become a PRO and actively contribute to the development of this extension.

review_note_feedback.message: Thank you for your feedback, feel free to send us a message so that we can improve this extension.

review_note_store.message: Thank you for your feedback, feel free to add a review on the Google Store. I would be very grateful ğŸ˜Š

screencast_error.message: An error has occurred during the tab record. {Click here} for a workaround.

screencast_modale_download_mp4.message: Better compatibility with PowerPoint, Keynote, etc.

screencast_modale_texte.message: You can download this video in different formats or get a share link.

screencast_modale_upload.message: Upload on the server and get the share link

screencast_onboarding_texte.message: Create a mobile video in GIF format in 1 click (max 20 seconds)

screenshot_modale_help.message: To save the picture with a good resolution, you can just do a right click on it, then "Copy Image", or "Save Image As"

settings_batterie_level.message: Battery level in the terminal header (%)

settings_change_analytics.message: I support the developer of this extension to improve his product thanks to Google Analytics. Data is anonymous.

settings_change_cursor.message: Don't change the cursor style in the device

settings_default_device.message: Default device of each new activation

settings_hide_header_footer.message: Hide the browser header and footer in the device (PWA)

settings_presenter_mode.message: Presentation mode (right-hand menu displayed on hover only)

settings_scrollbar_show.message: Show the native scrollbar in the device (if you don't have trackpad or mousewheel)

simulator_footer_info.message: This is a fake element. Use your own keyboard.

simulator_header_info.message: This is a fake element. To change the URL just use the Chrome text field on the top.
